summary: DOD spends billions on U.S. military installation construction projects, such as building barracks and road repairs. DOD must consider factors like promoting competition and small businesses when awarding construction contracts. However, it's not required to consider whether a contractor is local—i.e., whether they are located within 60 miles of the project site. title: DOD Construction Contracts: Contractor Proximity to Work Sites Varied
